programme.desc: Pada tahun 1992, di Bogota, Colombia, baron dadah Don Luis Sandoval menghantar penguatkuasanya Marco dan sekumpulan lelaki bersenjata untuk membunuh rakan sekutunya Fabio Restrepo dan keluarganya kerana Fabio telah menentangnya dengan cuba meninggalkan kehidupan jenayahnya. Fabio memberikan anak perempuannya yang berusia sembilan tahun, Cataleya, kad memori komputer SmartMedia yang dimuatkan dengan maklumat mengenai perniagaan Don Luis dan memberitahunya itu adalah "pasport"nya; dia juga memberikan alamat bapa saudaranya Emilio di Chicago, yang akan menjaganya. Akhirnya, dia meninggalkannya dengan kalung orkid cataleya ibunya. Selepas Fabio dan isterinya Alicia ditembak mati, Cataleya melarikan diri dan mencari suaka di Kedutaan A.S. Dia diberikan laluan ke Amerika Syarikat selepas menyerahkan kad memori kepada kakitangan kedutaan. Walaupun pegawai Amerika cuba memindahkannya ke dalam sistem jagaan angkat, Cataleya menjejaki bapa saudaranya di Chicago dan memintanya melatihnya sebagai pembunuh.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again. Second son Zhong (Ekin Cheng), returning from abroad, brings his close girlfriend Xi (Chan Miu-ying), shattering Mei's (Chen Songling) dream of him. Shadowed by her parents' divorce, Xi eventually breaks up with Zhong. Meanwhile, Mei regains her confidence and charm. Zhong begins to admire Mei, but Mei has already joined her good friend Hao (Louis Koo). Youngest daughter Tung (Lam Chi-kwan), a bright and clever girl, marries the promising young man Tung (Wong Kai-tak). However, under her father's strict control, she dares not reveal her relationship with Tung. Can each of them fulfill their dreams and find a good home?

programme.title: My Pet My Angel
programme.desc: After leaving her boyfriend, veterinary surgeon Kam Wai-ting (Lam Ha Mei) moves to Sai Kung with her beloved dog Donut and starts a new life. At her new workplace, Wai-ting meets animal communicator Wong Sing-yan (Chow Ka Lok). The duo often quarrel due to their different values regarding pets. In an accident, Sing-yan acquires skills for communicating with Donut, and a man and a dog gradually build a friendship and help each other. Sing-yan learns from Donut that Wai-ting has some love issues, so he helps her decipher her conundrum. The duo's relationship improves, and they gradually like each other. However, they do not have feelings of affection due to their age difference. Donut wants to play matchmaker for the duo, but it gets into hilarious situations. And its ideas even backfire. Each of the duo also has their own admirers, resulting in more obstacles in their relationship.

Newly appointed counseling psychologist Wang Shanmei (JW Wang Haoer) hopes to help them bravely confront and address their challenges, fostering mental health and allowing them to fully enjoy their brief but precious high school years.

Then, suddenly and mysteriously, FUNG, who is believed to be dead, turns up again, which makes the enigma even more intriguing. The relationship between PING and FUNG is also put to the test amidst such confusion. It is in fact a conspiracy by PING's stepmother and a conman. TO begins to investigate the mystery, which nonetheless places him in great danger and causes him to lose his job. Fortunately, he has YAN YUET-MUI (YEUNG SZE-KI, SHIRLEY), his childhood friend, by his side to help him through his darkest days. PING's family have become entangled in a series of mishaps ever since her marriage to FUNG. programme.title: News Treasury 2025
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure troveâ€”if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: Price Of Greed, The
programme.desc: Police Constable LUI TO (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) is shocked to discover that TSU FUNG (CHAN KIN FUNG, SAMMUL), who has reportedly gone missing for a year, is already dead and that his body has been claimed by his girlfriend LAM PING (TSUI KATE TSZ SHAN). Then, suddenly and mysteriously, FUNG, who is believed to be dead, turns up again, which makes the enigma even more intriguing. The relationship between PING and FUNG is also put to the test amidst such confusion. It is in fact a conspiracy by PING's stepmother and a conman. TO begins to investigate the mystery, which nonetheless places him in great danger and causes him to lose his job. Fortunately, he has YAN YUET-MUI (YEUNG SZE-KI, SHIRLEY), his childhood friend, by his side to help him through his darkest days. PING's family have become entangled in a series of mishaps ever since her marriage to FUNG. What she doesn't know is that eight members of MAO TAI's (CHAN HUNG LIT) con gang have already infiltrated the LAM familyâ€¦

Then, suddenly and mysteriously, FUNG, who is believed to be dead, turns up again, which makes the enigma even more intriguing. The relationship between PING and FUNG is also put to the test amidst such confusion. It is in fact a conspiracy by PING's stepmother and a conman. TO begins to investigate the mystery, which nonetheless places him in great danger and causes him to lose his job. While starting his new job, Yat-cheung is faced with personnel issues. Meanwhile, due to his unhappy childhood, Yat-cheng does not believe in marriage. However, he happens to hook up with Yau Chi-ching (Ali Lee). And Chi-ching then even starts working for the security company. Yat-cheng gradually has affectionate feelings for her. But the couple's relationship has to overcome certain hurdles. Moreover, problems keep cropping up as Ding-tin's son Cheuk-ting and his buddy Miu Shing-lam (Ricco Ng) secretly return to Hong Kong. Shing-lam even keeps picking on Yat-cheng. While Yat-cheng and Chi-ching's relationship gradually improves, Yat-cheng suspects Chi-ching has some ulterior motive as he somehow discovers her secret. programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

Dia terjumpa sebuah bilik rahsia di dalam rumah Malik di mana tersimpan barang-barang yang jelas sekali disorok oleh Malik. Sementara itu, Sofia nampak satu pembunuhan bakal berlaku yang mengganggu perasaannya sehingga merangsang dia untuk bertindak. Dia memujuk Black untuk pulang ke kampung halaman mereka di Seri Setia untuk menyiasat kes itu. Anehnya, penyiasatan Borhan ke atas kes Nurul Najwa juga membawanya ke Seri Setia. Di sana, dia ketemu semula rakan sekerja lamanya, yang menyimpan rahsia tentang kes dingin yang berlaku 20 tahun lalu.

programme.title: The Exorcist's 2nd Meter
programme.desc: Taxi driver Ma Kwai (Kenneth Ma) goes down the road to exorcism as he is destined to perpetuate the legacy of genie Shek Kam-dong. He is also reunited with the mature soul of his buddy Mok Wai-ho (Hubert Wu). He even encounters Sze Loi-sze (Gloria Tang) and his younger brother Sze Lo-sze, who are both exorcists. However, some demonic curse has caused Ma Kwai to keep thinking of a doctor by the name of Chong Tsz-yeuk (Mandy Wong). Tsz-yeuk then hooks up with genie Wind Lion god (C Kwan), eventually reviving certain memory of limbo in her subconscious. Pui Pui-na (Moon Lau) has died because of Ma Kwai. She then transforms into a phantom to keep him company. But Pui-na just cannot leave everything behind as she is too sentimental about the mortal realm. A child abuse case triggers off the comeback of demonic power. Wai-ho has actually been controlled by mysterious demonic power.

However, some demonic curse has caused Ma Kwai to keep thinking of a doctor by the name of Chong Tsz-yeuk (Mandy Wong). Tsz-yeuk then hooks up with genie Wind Lion god (C Kwan), eventually reviving certain memory of limbo in her subconscious. Pui Pui-na (Moon Lau) has died because of Ma Kwai. She then transforms into a phantom to keep him company. But Pui-na just cannot leave everything behind as she is too sentimental about the mortal realm. A child abuse case triggers off the comeback of demonic power. Wai-ho has actually been controlled by mysterious demonic power.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

He is invited by his buddy Ha Chung-chau (Tsui Wing) to join a security company that is tasked with protecting a tycoon called Tseung Ding-tin (KK Cheung). While starting his new job, Yat-cheung is faced with personnel issues. Meanwhile, due to his unhappy childhood, Yat-cheng does not believe in marriage. However, he happens to hook up with Yau Chi-ching (Ali Lee). And Chi-ching then even starts working for the security company. Yat-cheng gradually has affectionate feelings for her. But the couple's relationship has to overcome certain hurdles. Moreover, problems keep cropping up as Ding-tin's son Cheuk-ting and his buddy Miu Shing-lam (Ricco Ng) secretly return to Hong Kong. Shing-lam even keeps picking on Yat-cheng. While Yat-cheng and Chi-ching's relationship gradually improves, Yat-cheng suspects Chi-ching has some ulterior motive as he somehow discovers her secret. programme.title: Exorcist's 2nd Meter, The
programme.desc: Taxi driver Ma Kwai (Kenneth Ma) goes down the road to exorcism as he is destined to perpetuate the legacy of genie Shek Kam-dong. He is also reunited with the mature soul of his buddy Mok Wai-ho (Hubert Wu). He even encounters Sze Loi-sze (Gloria Tang) and his younger brother Sze Lo-sze, who are both exorcists. However, some demonic curse has caused Ma Kwai to keep thinking of a doctor by the name of Chong Tsz-yeuk (Mandy Wong). Tsz-yeuk then hooks up with genie Wind Lion god (C Kwan), eventually reviving certain memory of limbo in her subconscious. Pui Pui-na (Moon Lau) has died because of Ma Kwai. She then transforms into a phantom to keep him company. But Pui-na just cannot leave everything behind as she is too sentimental about the mortal realm. A child abuse case triggers off the comeback of demonic power. Wai-ho has actually been controlled by mysterious demonic power.

programme.desc: Jess and his friends are playing a game trying to use wind power to push the trolley through the hay bale arch. None of them can blow hard enough so it always slows down before it gets to the arch. Jess asks the Big Question - how can I make the trolley go faster. They try different ideas - blowing, making a bigger wind by blowing as a group, making an even bigger wind by flapping potato sacks but nothing is strong enough. Jess is asking Mimi for some help when a big gust of wind catches her potato sack blanket, making it billow out just like a ship's sail, which gives Jess a great idea! Maybe if he ties the sacks to the trolley, like a sail, the trolley will move in the wind. Success! Jess has answered another Big Question - he can move the trolley through the hay bale arch by tying a sail to it! And now they can all have fun riding in the trolley too! Yippety yay!

programme.title: News Treasury 2025
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure troveâ€”if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

programme.desc: Renovation contractor KWAN KA-ON (Miu Kiu Wai) is the elder of four siblings, while his wife SZE LONG-KIU (Sonija Kwok) is a typical housewife. Buying a house is their longtime dream. But when his eldest brother, KWAN KA-HONG's business goes under, they shelve their plan to help him overcome his difficulties. KIU has to look for a job too. Unwilling to see ON shoulder the burden on his own, KWAN KA-LOK (Linda Chung), the third of the siblings, turns to her supervisor GAO WANG-CHIM (Michael Tse) for assistance, resulting in her taking part in an indecent proposal. Her boyfriend, TING KOON-FUNG (Ron Ng), breaks up angrily with her when he finds out about their affair. KWAN KA-WING (Him Law), the youngest of the four, prefers spending to saving and decides that he will in no circumstances help in the service of the mortgage. programme.desc: Raisa yang patah hati selepas tunangnya, Rio, hilang tiba-tiba, pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari jawapan. Perkenalan mereka secara kebetulan menjadi semakin rapat apabila mereka mula mengenali diri sebenar masing-masing. Namun, cinta mereka diuji apabila terbongkar bahawa ibu Mike, Rika, adalah isteri kedua kepada ayah Raisa, menyebabkan perebutan harta antara keluarga mereka.

programme.title: PHOENIX WEATHER FORECAST
programme.desc: Phoenix's engaging young presenter tracks weather movements and forecasts upcoming conditions in her upbeat, lively presentation coupled with music, folklore and traditional wisdom pertaining to different weather conditions in various times of the year, making Weather Forecast a true delight regardless of rain or shine.

programme.title: Lakshmi Kalyanam
programme.desc: Lakshmi's life takes an unexpected turn when her family gets her married to a rich businessman, Rishi. However, she is feeling betrayed when she learns the truth about her marriage

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Viktor Navorski is trapped in John F. Kennedy Airport when he is denied entry into the United States and at the same time cannot return to his native country.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Someone has been swiping fish off Cap'n Turbot's boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate. Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now it's up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions
programme.desc: On Jen's birthday she and Andy are sent to follow a new baby elephant to make sure it can use it's trunk properly.

programme.title: The Nation
programme.desc: The Nation is a talkshow on the who's who and the everyday people. Everyone has a story, what's yours?

programme.title: LaLiga - Real Oviedo vs Real Betis
programme.desc: Extensive coverage from every round of the Spanish LaLiga, Spain's top division of football with the World's biggest teams.
